item.title: Half-Truths
item.description: When You Assume When you assume you make an ass out of you and me. [ASS U ME] — and yet, before it even makes sense to utter that statment, I assume you understand English; I assume that you can hear me, that you’re listening, that you’re not an asshat. Too many cooks Two many cooks spoil the broth — except, when two heads are better than one.
